sentences.en: an old house with crumbling plaster and a leaking roof
sentences.cn: 一所灰泥剥落、屋顶漏水的老房子

sentences.en: Ben has also been in the wars. He is still in plaster after breaking a leg.
sentences.cn: 本也受了伤。他摔断了一条腿，现在还打着石膏。

sentences.en: He mixed up some plaster to repair the wall.
sentences.cn: 他和了一些灰泥去补墙.

sentences.en: He's got his leg in a plaster cast.
It had a high ceiling, ornamented with plaster fruits and flowers.
sentences.cn: 天花板很高，上面装饰着石膏水果和花朵。

sentences.en: Obviously the plaster's just perished and all fallen off.
sentences.cn: 很明显灰泥已脆裂老化，全剥落下来了。

sentences.en: Plaster had fallen away in places, exposing the brickwork.
sentences.cn: 有些地方的灰泥脱落了，露出了砖。

sentences.en: She applied the plaster on his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她将膏药贴在他的膀子上.

sentences.en: She gets sunburned even when she plasters herself from head to toe in factor 7 sun lotion.
sentences.cn: 即使她从头到脚涂抹上防晒系数是7的防晒霜，她也会被晒伤。

sentences.en: She made a plaster cast of a bust of Lincoln.
sentences.cn: 她用石膏塑造了一座林肯半身像.

sentences.en: The building was of greyish plaster and looked old.
sentences.cn: 这幢楼刷的是浅灰色的灰泥，看上去有些陈旧。

sentences.en: The bullet slammed into the ceiling, spraying them with bits of plaster.
sentences.cn: 子弹砰地射进了天花板，掉落的石膏碎片落了他们一身。

sentences.en: The ceiling he had just plastered fell in and knocked him off his ladder.
sentences.cn: 他刚抹过灰泥的那块天花板脱落了，把他从梯子上砸了下来。

sentences.en: The paintings were concealed beneath a thick layer of plaster.
sentences.cn: 那些画被隐藏在厚厚的灰泥层下面。

sentences.en: The plaster is scaling off the wall.
There were huge cracks in the plaster, and the green shutters were faded.
sentences.cn: 灰泥上出现多条大裂缝，绿色百叶窗也褪色了。

sentences.en: They took a plaster cast of the teeth for identification purposes.
sentences.cn: 他们做了这副牙的石膏模型作鉴别之用。

words.tran_cn: 抹灰泥工作；灰泥天花板
使平；涂以灰泥；粘贴；掩饰（plaster的过去分词形式）
减轻；粘贴；涂以灰泥；敷以膏药；使平服

phrases.tran_cn: 石膏灰泥，石膏抹面；石膏胶凝材料；粉饰用石膏粉
n. 灰泥板；灰胶纸柏板；糊墙纸板

trans.tran_en: a substance used to cover walls and ceilings with a smooth even surface. It consists of  lime  , water, and sand.
a substance used to cover walls and ceilings with a smooth even surface. It consists of  lime  , water, and sand.
to put wet plaster on a wall or ceiling

trans.tran_cn: 涂以灰泥，在…上敷贴膏药，减轻，黏贴
trans.tran_en: to put a wet usually sticky substance all over a surface so that it is thickly covered
